```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

# Filter to wanted cell states
wanted_states <- c("Naive", "Formative", "Primed", "Formative_Neuron", "Primed_Neuron")
df_filtered <- df_filtered %>% filter(Cell_State %in% wanted_states)

# Set factor order
df_filtered$Cell_State <- factor(df_filtered$Cell_State, levels = wanted_states)

# Plot boxplot WITHOUT fill color by Timeline
p <- ggplot(df_filtered, aes(x = Cell_State, y = Methylation_Percentage)) +
  geom_boxplot(outlier.size = 1, width = 0.7, fill = "lightgray", color = "black") +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 100, 10), limits = c(0, 110)) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14) +
  labs(
    title = "Methylation Percentage at POMC",
    x = "Sample Type",
    y = "Methylation Percentage"
  ) +
  theme(
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1),
    legend.position = "none"
  )

print(p)
ggsave("pomc_methylation_boxplot_by_cell_state.svg", p, width = 12, height = 8)

```



```{r}
# Ensure Cell_State is a factor and ordered (optional)
df_filtered <- df_filtered %>%
  mutate(Cell_State = factor(Cell_State, levels = unique(Cell_State)))

# Compute mean and max methylation for label placement
mean_labels <- df_filtered %>%
  group_by(Cell_State) %>%
  summarise(
    mean_meth = mean(Methylation_Percentage, na.rm = TRUE),
    max_meth = max(Methylation_Percentage, na.rm = TRUE),
    .groups = "drop"
  )

# Plot
p <- ggplot(df_filtered, aes(x = Cell_State, y = Methylation_Percentage, fill = Timeline)) +
  geom_boxplot(outlier.size = 1, width = 0.7) +
  geom_text(data = mean_labels, 
            aes(x = Cell_State, y = max_meth + 5, 
                label = paste("Mean:", round(mean_meth, 1))), 
            inherit.aes = FALSE, size = 4, fontface = "bold", vjust = 0) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 100, 10), limits = c(0, 110)) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14) +
  labs(
    title = "Methylation Percentage per Cell State",
    x = "Cell State",
    y = "Methylation Percentage",
    fill = "Timeline"
  ) +
  theme(
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1),
    legend.position = "top"
  )

# Save and show plot
ggsave("methylation_boxplot_by_cell_state.svg", p, width = 12, height = 8)
print(p)
```



#25.04 bar plot

```{r}
# Define custom colors for developmental tracks
track_colors <- c(
  "Formative" = "#F4A3D1",  # Pink
  "Primed" = "#82D182"      # Green
)

# Define desired order of cell states
desired_order <- c("Naive", "Formative", "POMC_formative", "Primed", "POMC_primed")

# Clean and filter the data (Assuming you've already filtered the cell line and renamed states)
df_clean <- df_filtered %>%
  mutate(Cell_State = factor(Cell_State, levels = desired_order)) %>%      # Order Cell_State
  mutate(
    Track = case_when(
      Cell_State %in% c("Naive", "Formative", "POMC_formative") ~ "Formative",
      Cell_State %in% c("Primed", "POMC_primed") ~ "Primed"
    ),
    Track = factor(Track, levels = c("Formative", "Primed"))
  )  # Assign developmental track

# Stop if data is still empty
if (nrow(df_clean) == 0) {
  stop("No data remains after filtering for valid cell states.")
}

# Compute average methylation per genomic position
mean_meth <- df_clean %>%
  group_by(Cell_State, genomic_position, Track) %>%  # Group by both Cell_State, genomic_position, and Track
  summarise(mean_meth = mean(Methylation_Percentage), .groups = "drop")

# Compute the total average methylation for each Cell_State
total_avg_meth <- df_clean %>%
  group_by(Cell_State) %>%
  summarise(total_avg_meth = mean(Methylation_Percentage), .groups = "drop")

# Plot
p <- ggplot(mean_meth, aes(x = factor(genomic_position), y = mean_meth, fill = Track)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = position_dodge()) +
  facet_wrap(~ Cell_State, scales = "fixed", ncol = 1) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14) +  # Increased base font size
  labs(title = "Mean Methylation Percentage per Genomic Position by Cell State",
       x = "Genomic Position",
       y = "Methylation Percentage",
       fill = "Developmental Track") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, size = 10),
        strip.text = element_text(face = "bold", size = 12),
        panel.spacing = unit(1.5, "lines")) +  # More space between panels
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 100, 20), limits = c(0, 100)) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = track_colors) +  # Apply color scale for Track
  # Add total average methylation value to each facet at the top-right corner
  geom_text(data = total_avg_meth, aes(x = Inf, y = Inf, label = paste0("Mean: ", round(total_avg_meth, 1))), 
            vjust = 1.5, hjust = 1.1, size = 3.5, inherit.aes = FALSE, color = "black")

# Print plot
print(p)

# Save plot with larger size
ggsave("average_methylation_per_genomic_position_with_avg_top_right.svg", p, width = 16, height = 24)
```

#timeline boxplot
```{r}
track_colors <- c(
  "Formative" = "#F4A3D1",  # Pink
  "Primed" = "#82D182"      # Green
)

final_order <- c("Naive", "Formative", "Primed", "Formative_Neuron", "Primed_Neuron")



# Step 3: Rename AFTER filtering and assign developmental track groups
df_filtered <- df_filtered %>%
  mutate(
    Cell_State = recode(Cell_State),
    Timeline = case_when(
      Cell_State %in% c("Naive", "Formative", "POMC_formative") ~ "Formative",
      Cell_State %in% c("Primed", "POMC_primed") ~ "Primed"
    ),
    Cell_State = factor(Cell_State, levels = final_order)
  )

# Step 4: Compute mean methylation for each cell state
mean_labels <- df_filtered %>%
  group_by(Cell_State) %>%
  summarise(mean_meth = mean(Methylation_Percentage, na.rm = TRUE), .groups = "drop")

# Step 5: Compute the maximum methylation value for each cell state (for label placement)
max_y_values <- df_filtered %>%
  group_by(Cell_State) %>%
  summarise(max_meth = max(Methylation_Percentage, na.rm = TRUE), .groups = "drop")

# Merge mean and max methylation values for label placement
mean_labels <- left_join(mean_labels, max_y_values, by = "Cell_State")

# Step 6: Plot boxplot and place mean labels just above the boxplots
p <- ggplot(df_filtered, aes(x = Cell_State, y = Methylation_Percentage, fill = Timeline)) +
  geom_boxplot(outlier.size = 1, width = 0.7) +
  geom_text(data = mean_labels, aes(x = Cell_State, y = max_meth + 5,  # Position just above the max value
                                    label = paste("Mean:", round(mean_meth, 1))), 
            inherit.aes = FALSE, size = 4, fontface = "bold", vjust = 0) +  # Adjust vertical position
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 100, 10), limits = c(0, 110)) +  # Slightly adjusted y-axis limits
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14) +
  labs(
    title = "Methylation Percentage per Cell State (H1 Line)",
    x = "Cell State",
    y = "Methylation Percentage",
    fill = "Developmental Track"  # Change legend title to "Developmental Track"
  ) +
  theme(
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1),
    legend.position = "top"
  )

# Step 7: Save the plot at a larger size
ggsave("developmental_track_boxplot_with_avg_above_updated.svg", p, width = 12, height = 8)

# Step 8: Print the plot to console
print(p)
```

```{r}
df_long$Experiment <- substr(df_long$Sample_ID, 1, 1)

experiment_ids <- unique(df_long$Experiment)

for (exp_id in experiment_ids) {
  
  exp_data <- df_long %>%

    geom_boxplot(outlier.shape = NA, alpha = 0.6) +  
    geom_jitter(aes(color = Cell_Line), width = 0.2, size = 1, alpha = 0.8) +  
    theme_minimal() +
    labs(title = paste("Experiment", exp_id, "- Methylation Distribution"),
         x = "Genomic Position",
         y = "Methylation Percentage",
         fill = "Cell Line") +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1)) +
    scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 100, by = 10), limits = c(0, 100)) +
    facet_wrap(~ Cell_State, scales = "fixed")

  print(p)
```

```{r}
df_long$Experiment <- substr(df_long$Sample_ID, 1, 1)

experiment_ids <- unique(df_long$Experiment)
cell_lines <- unique(df_long$Cell_Line)

for (cell in cell_lines) {
  
  cell_data <- df_long %>% 
    filter(Cell_Line == cell & (!is.na(Cell_State)))  # Filter for each cell line and remove NA values

  if (nrow(cell_data) == 0) {  
    warning(paste("Skipping Cell Line", cell, "due to all Cell_State values being NA"))
    next  # Skip if there's no valid data
  }
  
  for (exp_id in experiment_ids) {
    
    exp_data <- cell_data %>% 
      filter(Experiment == exp_id | Sample_ID == "NK")
    
    if (nrow(exp_data) == 0) {
      warning(paste("Skipping Experiment", exp_id, "for Cell Line", cell, "due to no valid data"))
      next
    }
    
    p <- ggplot(exp_data, aes(x = factor(genomic_position), y = Methylation_Percentage, fill = Cell_Line)) +
      geom_boxplot(outlier.shape = NA, alpha = 0.6) +  
      geom_jitter(aes(color = Cell_Line), width = 0.2, size = 1, alpha = 0.8) +  
      theme_minimal() +
      labs(title = paste("Experiment", exp_id, "-", cell, "- Methylation Distribution"),
           x = "Genomic Position",
           y = "Methylation Percentage",
           fill = "Cell Line") +
      theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1)) +
      scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 100, by = 10), limits = c(0, 100)) +
      facet_wrap(~ Cell_State, scales = "fixed")

    print(p)  # Print each plot on a separate page
  }
}
```

```{r}
df_long$Experiment <- substr(df_long$Sample_ID, 1, 1)

experiment_ids <- unique(df_long$Experiment)
cell_states <- unique(df_long$Cell_State)

for (exp_id in experiment_ids) {
  for (cell_state in cell_states) {
    
    exp_data <- df_long %>% 
      filter((Experiment == exp_id | Sample_ID == "NK") & Cell_State == cell_state) %>%
      group_by(Sample_ID, Cell_Line, genomic_position) %>%  
      summarise(Avg_Methylation = mean(Methylation_Percentage, na.rm = TRUE), .groups = 'drop')  
    
    # Skip if there's no data for this Cell_State
    if (nrow(exp_data) == 0) next  

    p <- ggplot(exp_data, aes(x = factor(genomic_position), y = Avg_Methylation, 
                              color = Sample_ID, group = Sample_ID)) +  
      geom_line(size = 1) +  
      geom_point(size = 2) + 
      theme_minimal() +
      labs(title = paste("Experiment", exp_id, "-", cell_state, "- Average Methylation"),
           x = "Genomic Position",
           y = "Average Methylation Percentage",
```

```{r}
  df_filtered <- df_long %>% filter(Cell_State == state)
  df_means_filtered <- df_means %>% filter(Cell_State == state)

  p <- ggplot(df_filtered, aes(x = factor(genomic_position), y = Methylation_Percentage, 
                                fill = Cell_State)) + 
    geom_boxplot(outlier.size = 2, width = 0.7, position = position_dodge(width = 0.75)) +  
    geom_text(data = df_means_filtered, 
              aes(label = paste("Mean:", round(Mean_Methylation, 1)),

    labs(title = paste("Boxplot of Methylation Percentage -", state),
         x = "Genomic Position",
         y = "Methylation Percentage",

    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1)) + 
    scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 100, by = 10), limits = c(0, 100)) +  
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))  

  print(p)  
}
```
